text: O vy, kotoryye uverovali, znayte, chto mnogiye iz iudeyskikh ravvinov i khristianskikh monakhov nepravednym putom ovladevayut imushchestvom lyudey i, pol'zuyas' doveriyem lyudey k nim i tem, chto lyudi slushayut ikh sovety i nastavleniya, starayutsya uklonit' ikh ot istinnoy religii - islama. Predupredi (o Mukhammad!) tekh, kotoryye nakaplivayut zoloto i serebro, sberegaya ikh i ne davaya ochishcheniya (zakyat), o muchitel'nom nakazanii
